name: jsnetworkx
description: A graph processing and visualization library for JavaScript (port of NetworkX for Python).

scripts.build:node: rm -rf node/ && node scripts/build-node.js src/ node/
scripts.build:node:dev: rm -rf node/ && node scripts/build-node.js --dev src/ node/
scripts.build:browser: (export BUNDLE=jsnetworkx.js; rm -f $BUNDLE && browserify src/browser.js -s jsnx | uglifyjs -cmo $BUNDLE)
scripts.build:browser:dev: (export BUNDLE=jsnetworkx-dev.js; rm -f $BUNDLE && NODE_ENV=dev browserify src/browser.js -ds jsnx > $BUNDLE)
scripts.watch:browser: (export BUNDLE=jsnetworkx-dev.js; rm -f $BUNDLE && NODE_ENV=dev watchify src/browser.js -vds jsnx -o $BUNDLE)
scripts.test: npm run build:node:dev && mocha --ui exports -R progress -r './scripts/setup-testenv.js' `find node/ -name *-test.js`
scripts.cover: npm run build:node && istanbul cover _mocha -x '**/__tests__/**' -x 'scripts/*' -x 'node/drawing/*' -- --ui exports -R progress -r './scripts/setup-testenv.js' `find node/ -name *-test.js`
